panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment it is first received by a voter / gathers full QC
panels.title: Block creation to vote / QC
Num of timeout rounds since restart
Total time spent on state sync
Total time spent on block retrieval

panels.description: Count of the proposals that passed the timestamp rules and did not have to wait
panels.title: Proposal no wait required count

panels.description: Count of the proposals where passing the timestamp rules required waiting
panels.title: Proposal wait was required count

panels.description: Count of the proposals that were not made due to the waiting period exceeding the maximum allowed duration, breaking timestamp rules
panels.title: Proposal maximum wait exceeded count

panels.description: Count of the proposals that were not made due to waiting to ensure the current time exceeds min_duration_since_epoch failed, breaking timestamp rules
panels.title: Proposal wait failed count

panels.description: Average time waited for successfully proposing a proposal (both those that waited and didn't wait) after following timestamp rules
panels.title: Avg time waiting for proposal success

panels.description: Average time waited for failing to propose a proposal (both those that waited and didn't wait) while trying to follow timestamp rules
panels.title: Avg time waiting for proposal failure

panels.description: Count of the votes that passed the timestamp rules and did not have to wait
panels.title: Vote no wait required count

panels.description: Count of the votes where passing the timestamp rules required waiting
panels.title: Vote wait was required count

panels.description: Count of the votes that were not made due to the waiting period exceeding the maximum allowed duration, breaking timestamp rules
panels.title: Vote maximum wait exceeded count

panels.description: Count of the votes that were not made due to waiting to ensure the current time exceeds min_duration_since_epoch failed, breaking timestamp rules
panels.title: Vote wait failed count

panels.description: Average time waited for successfully having the ability to vote (both those that waited and didn't wait) after following timestamp rules.  A success only means that a replica has an opportunity to vote.  It may not vote if it doesn't pass the voting rules.
panels.title: Avg time waiting for ability to vote success

panels.description: Average time waited for failing to have the ability to vote (both those that waited and didn't wait) while trying to follow timestamp rules
panels.title: Avg time waiting for ability to vote failure
